caption.p: Crystal structure of MgSi 5: a) Short Si−Si distances indicated by golden lines emphasize the framework of four‐bonded silicon atoms with Si 15 cages ([4 25 26 4], light‐blue) centered by Mg atoms and two kinds of empty cages A and B (light gray). b) Columns of condensed centered [MgSi 15] cages. c, d) Face‐sharing empty Si 8 cages of types A and B, respectively.
